mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRAMA_COMMENT ( DRAMA_NO, DC_NO, ID, DC_REG_DATE, DC_CONTENT, DC_LIKE, DC_LIKE_ID ) VALUES ( #{DRAMA_NO}, SEQ_DRAMA_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{ID}, sysdate, #{COM}, 0, '0' )
mapper.select: select * from drama_comment where id=#{ID} AND DRAMA_NO=#{DRAMA_NO}

SELECT DRAMA_NO, DC_NO, ID, DC_REG_DATE, DC_CONTENT, DC_LIKE, DC_LIKE_ID, DL_GRADE, RNUM FROM (SELECT DRAMA_NO, DC_NO, ID, DC_REG_DATE, DC_CONTENT, DC_LIKE, DC_LIKE_ID, TO_CHAR(DL_GRADE,'0.0') AS DL_GRADE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT DC.DRAMA_NO, DC.DC_NO,DC.ID,DC.DC_REG_DATE,DC.DC_CONTENT,DC.DC_LIKE,DC.DC_LIKE_ID,DL.DL_GRADE FROM DRAMA_LIKE DL, DRAMA_COMMENT DC WHERE DL.DRAMA_LIKE_NO=DC.DRAMA_NO AND DL.ID=DC.ID ORDER BY DC_REG_DATE DESC) ORDER BY RNUM ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT DRAMA_NO, DC_NO, ID, DC_REG_DATE, DC_CONTENT, DC_LIKE, DC_LIKE_ID, DL_GRADE, RNUM FROM (SELECT DRAMA_NO, DC_NO, ID, DC_REG_DATE, DC_CONTENT, DC_LIKE, DC_LIKE_ID, TO_CHAR(DL_GRADE,'0.0') AS DL_GRADE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT DC.DRAMA_NO, DC.DC_NO,DC.ID,DC.DC_REG_DATE,DC.DC_CONTENT,DC.DC_LIKE,DC.DC_LIKE_ID,DL.DL_GRADE FROM DRAMA_LIKE DL, DRAMA_COMMENT DC WHERE DL.DRAMA_LIKE_NO=DC.DRAMA_NO AND DL.ID=DC.ID and DC.DRAMA_NO=#{DRAMA_NO} ORDER BY DC_LIKE DESC) ORDER BY RNUM ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
select count(*) as count from DRAMA_COMMENT where DRAMA_NO = ${DRAMA_NO}
mapper.delete: delete drama_comment where drama_no=#{DRAMA_NO} and ID=#{ID}
mapper.update: update drama_comment set dc_content=#{MCOM} where id=#{ID} and drama_no=${DRAMA_NO}
